email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $50.25 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.25 is acceptable, but could we push the laycan to 16-21 October to give us a bit more flexibility? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Let me know if we can finalize these terms. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to 16-21 October as requested. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $20,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. If this works for you, I can draft the charter party agreement today. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for accommodating the laycan change. We can proceed with the demurrage at $20,000 per day. Please go ahead with the charter party agreement, and send it over for review. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ve attached the draft charter party agreement for your review. Let me know if there are any additional changes needed. Once confirmed, we can proceed to execution. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
